basic.description: Functions, limits, derivatives; optimization, rate problems, exponentials, logarithms, inverse trigonometric functions; exponential growth as an example of a differential equation. Fundamental Theorem of Calculus, Riemann integral; applications to problems involving areas, volumes, mass, charge, work, etc. Some integration techniques.
basic.subject: APSC
basic.title: Calculus I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Must be registered in a BSCE or UENG program.
